nodes.text: The Bolotaur Beach was an area next to a river in the jungles of Kashyyyk. It was populated by many aggressive bolotaurs.

Doctor Farnsworth had set up a survey device in this area to collect data about the environment. When his survey devices stopped sending signals, Farnsworth asked a spacer to travel to the devices and download the data from the devices' memory banks.

This area is a location in Rage of the Wookiees, the second expansion for Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. The name of the area was revealed during the quest Collecting Survey Data for Doctor Farnsworth.
